capability.name: Prospect Campaign Execution
capability.definition: Execute a prospect campaign (version) and track and respond to impact
capability.role: Handle the deployment, execution and on-going refinement of a prospect campaign. This includes many types of proactive prospect acquisition campaigns. The campaign execution process performs the initial selection and confirmation/validation of candidate lists and includes providing critical feedback on the impact of the campaign to the design unit to support re-calibration and refinement of the specification based on practical experience
capability.example: A bank implements a targeted take-one mailshot acquisition campaign to attract additional customers

key_features.name: Candidate prospect selection/identification (list development)
key_features.description: Enables candidate prospect selection/identification (list development) to support execute a prospect campaign (version) and track and respond to impact

key_features.name: Prospect interaction and response capture
key_features.description: Enables prospect interaction and response capture to support execute a prospect campaign (version) and track and respond to impact

key_features.name: Campaign performance analysis and feedback
key_features.description: Enables campaign performance analysis and feedback to support execute a prospect campaign (version) and track and respond to impact
